data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

You ____ build ____ design ____ a ____ time, during ____ your ____ might ____ work ____ all. Evolution can't work ____ way. Evolution's design problem, you might say, is like trying to design a better and better house while people are still living in it the whole time.
data.partBlankContent: What does this mean? Well, if y__ are crea____ a cons____ product, you c__ completely des____ it a__ try some_____ completely diff_____. You c__ build a__ design f__ a lo__ time, during wh___ your pro____ might n__ work a_ all. Evolution can't work th__ way. Evolution's design problem, you might say, is like trying to design a better and better house while people are still living in it the whole time.
data.fullContent: What does this mean? Well, if you are creating a consumer product, you can completely destroy it and try something completely different. You can build and design for a long time, during which your product might not work at all. Evolution can't work this way. Evolution's design problem, you might say, is like trying to design a better and better house while people are still living in it the whole time.
data.answer: 这是什么意思?如果你在创造一种消费产品，你可以完全摧毁它，尝试一些完全不同的东西。您可以长时间地构建和设计，在此期间您的产品可能根本无法工作。进化不能这样进行。进化的设计问题，你可能会说，就像试图设计一个更好的房子，而人们在此期间仍然住在里面。
